Mastering Twitter and LinkedIn Advertising

Workshop overview:

Twitter and LinkedIn hold a wealth of data that you can strategically leverage to grow your online communities, and reach and engage your audience.

This workshop will explain the advertising and targeting options available within LinkedIn and Twitter to enable you to plan, set up and track your campaigns and results.

This workshop will cover:

  • the power of paid advertising and the significant results it can bring
  • Twitter and LinkedIn advertising options
  • an introduction to social media advertising insights.

Workshop objectives:

  • to develop understanding and confidence in the options available for advertising on Twitter and LinkedIn
  • how to use social media advertising to achieve business goals

This workshop is for:

  • people who manage Twitter accounts and/or LinkedIn company pages, and want to understand and master their advertising options

What’s included:

  • full set of training resources
  • high quality training

Prerequisites:

  • a Twitter account and/or Admin access to a LinkedIn company page
  • an understanding of social media and its application in a business environment (this is covered in our Social Media for Business workshop)

Please note: You are required to bring your own laptop.

Each session is restricted to limited participants (six to ten attendees), so you have the opportunity to fully benefit from the trainer’s knowledge and advice.

Power up your profits with social media advertising. Book your spot.

Discounts for booking multiple sessions:

The training sessions can be taken individually, but have also been designed to work together to build on the knowledge and skills gained.

There are also great discounts for booking three or more sessions:

  • 1-2 sessions: $330 + BF + GST (per session)
  • 3 or more sessions: $300 + BF + GST (per session)

For multiple session bookings, you can also contact us to enquire about payment plan options.

Your social media marketing trainer:

Jen Evison – from Jennifer Evison Consulting.

Jen has extensive experience in the social media space and is renowned for her food and beverage marketing. Previously, she managed the social media channels for Allrecipes in the US before moving to Australia and continues to work with Australian and US businesses helping them achieve social media success over the past decade, including a prominent wine brand.

With tertiary qualifications in business marketing, she has a genuine talent for strategising, being across best practice and creatively discovering and constructing effective content for a range of social media channels.

Jen has an unending enthusiasm for presenting and participants will be delighted by her effervescent and good humoured nature.

See Jen's workshops here.

Mastering Twitter and LinkedIn Advertising

Enhance your Twitter and LinkedIn marketing, with strategic, targeted and effective advertising campaigns.

Location: Intersect, 167 Flinders Street, Adelaide, South Australia

Cost: $180 + BF + GST
